00020 #ifndef _RTDM_INTERNAL_H
00021 #define _RTDM_INTERNAL_H
00022 
00023 #include <linux/list.h>
00024 #include <linux/proc_fs.h>
00025 #include <linux/sem.h>
00026 
00027 #include <nucleus/pod.h>
00028 #include <nucleus/ppd.h>
00029 #include <rtdm/rtdm_driver.h>
00030 
00031 #define RTDM_FD_MAX                     CONFIG_XENO_OPT_RTDM_FILDES
00032 
00033 #define DEF_DEVNAME_HASHTAB_SIZE        256     /* entries in name hash table */
00034 #define DEF_PROTO_HASHTAB_SIZE          256     /* entries in protocol hash table */
00035 
00036 struct rtdm_fildes {
00037         struct rtdm_dev_context *context;
00038 };
00039 
00040 struct rtdm_process {
00041 #ifdef CONFIG_PROC_FS
00042         char name[32];
00043         pid_t pid;
00044 #endif /* CONFIG_PROC_FS */
00045 
00046         xnshadow_ppd_t ppd;
00047 };
00048 
00049 DECLARE_EXTERN_XNLOCK(rt_fildes_lock);
00050 DECLARE_EXTERN_XNLOCK(rt_dev_lock);
00051 
00052 extern int __rtdm_muxid;
00053 extern struct rtdm_fildes fildes_table[];
00054 extern int open_fildes;
00055 extern struct semaphore nrt_dev_lock;
00056 extern unsigned int devname_hashtab_size;
00057 extern unsigned int protocol_hashtab_size;
00058 extern struct list_head *rtdm_named_devices;
00059 extern struct list_head *rtdm_protocol_devices;
00060 extern struct proc_dir_entry *rtdm_proc_root;
00061 
00062 #ifdef MODULE
00063 #define rtdm_initialised 1
00064 #else /* !MODULE */
00065 extern int rtdm_initialised;
00066 #endif /* MODULE */
00067 
00068 void cleanup_owned_contexts(void *user_info);
00069 int rtdm_no_support(void);
00070 struct rtdm_device *get_named_device(const char *name);
00071 struct rtdm_device *get_protocol_device(int protocol_family, int socket_type);
00072 
00073 static inline void rtdm_dereference_device(struct rtdm_device *device)
00074 {
00075         atomic_dec(&device->reserved.refcount);
00076 }
00077 
00078 int __init rtdm_dev_init(void);
00079 
00080 static inline void rtdm_dev_cleanup(void)
00081 {
00082         kfree(rtdm_named_devices);
00083         kfree(rtdm_protocol_devices);
00084 }
00085 
00086 int rtdm_proc_register_device(struct rtdm_device *device);
00087 int __init rtdm_proc_init(void);
00088 void rtdm_proc_cleanup(void);
00089 
00090 #endif /* _RTDM_INTERNAL_H */
